channel.title: Partnerships on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Partnerships on FinanClub

item.title: ERIC
item.description: score:135 Chances: Ericsson (ERIC) has been selected by Three Ireland and Orange Spain to implement advanced applications for 5G Standalone and private 5G networks, showcasing strong partnerships and growth potential in the telecommunications sector. The company’s private 5G network offers secure and reliable connectivity, positioning Ericsson as a key player in the development of 5G infrastructure.

item.title: OGN
item.description: score:21 Chances: Organon’s partnership with Sempre Health to improve medication adherence shows a proactive approach to patient care and may lead to increased sales. The company’s exclusive distribution of Emgality and RAYVOW in Europe presents a significant opportunity for revenue growth in the region.
